jobDescription: BlueVoyant is a global cybersecurity firm that provides Advanced Threat Intelligence for larger companies, and a comprehensive Managed Security Service and Cyber Forensics and Incident Response services for smaller businesses, powered by one of the largest commercially-available cyber threat databases in the world.  With BlueVoyant companies can gain unique and far-reaching visibility into malicious activity on their networks, in the dark web and across the internet, as well as real-time, automatable remediation services. Through our unique real-time external threat monitoring, predictive human and machine-sourced intelligence, and proactive managed security and incident response, BlueVoyant offers the private sector unparalleled distant early warning and exceptional cyber defense capabilities.  BlueVoyant is driven by and dedicated to the mission of protecting our economy and infrastructure from cyber attacks. BlueVoyant has attracted a management team that comes from the worlds preeminent intelligence, law enforcement, and private sector organizations.
